edu.vserver.standardutils
Class StandardUIFactory

java.lang.Object
  edu.vserver.standardutils.StandardUIFactory

public final class StandardUIFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of factory methods for fetching certain generally usable components with ViLLE-styling.

Author:
Erkki Kaila

Method Summary

          Returns a borderless panel with light styling.
static Button getDefaultButton(java.lang.String caption, Resource icon)
          Returns a default style button to use in dialogs and such.
